meanings.definition: To cause strong feelings of joy.
examples: It was exciting to catch my first fish.

images.alt: Photo of a person jumping in the air.
images.description: A person jumping into the air. Her arms are extended out wide.
images.caption: You can see this person is excited, because she is jumping.

meanings.definition: To create something for the first time.
examples: Thomas Edison invented the electric light bulb.

meanings.definition: Relating to wanting to win at a game or contest.
examples: I am a very competitive runner.

images.alt: Photo of a line of athletes starting a running race.
images.description: A line of people just starting a running race. The people all lean forward. They have serious expressions on their faces.
images.caption: Being competitive can help you win races.

source.title: Athletes Running on Track and Field Oval in Grayscale Photography
source.author: Pixabay

meanings.definition: The equipment required for a task or sport.
examples: Having the right fishing tackle makes catching fish easier.

images.alt: Photo of a box with fishing lures.
images.description: A box with sections. Hooks, weights, and shiny lures are in each section of the box.
images.caption: A box filled with fishing tackle.

source.title: Black and Silver Fish Wall Decor
source.author: cottonbro

examples: She works to keep the water clean and protect other parts of the environment, too.
